title: [CAP] Ingest Accounting Events (Cross-Module)
body:
/kiro
# Business Requirement

## Classification (confirm labels)
- Type: capability
- Layer: domain
- Domain: accounting

## Epic
[EPIC] Enable Event-Driven Accounting (AP/AR + General Ledger)

## Capability
[CAP] Ingest Accounting Events (Cross-Module)

## Description
Receive accounting events from other modules and manage validation, idempotency, and processing lifecycle.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Events can be received (sync/async) and persisted with status tracking
- [ ] Duplicate events do not create duplicate postings
- [ ] Invalid events are rejected with actionable errors or routed to suspense per policy

title: [CAP] Maintain Chart of Accounts and Posting Categories
body:
/kiro
# Business Requirement

## Classification (confirm labels)
- Type: capability
- Layer: domain
- Domain: accounting

## Epic
[EPIC] Enable Event-Driven Accounting (AP/AR + General Ledger)

## Capability
[CAP] Maintain Chart of Accounts and Posting Categories

## Description
Define CoA, posting categories, and mapping keys used to translate business events into accounting structure.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] CoA and categories can be created/edited with effective dates
- [ ] Event mapping keys resolve to specific accounts and dimensions deterministically
- [ ] Changes are audit-logged and do not mutate historical postings

title: [CAP] Post Journal Entries to the General Ledger
body:
/kiro
# Business Requirement

## Classification (confirm labels)
- Type: capability
- Layer: domain
- Domain: accounting

## Epic
[EPIC] Enable Event-Driven Accounting (AP/AR + General Ledger)

## Capability
[CAP] Post Journal Entries to the General Ledger

## Description
Translate mapped events into journal entries and post to the GL with period controls and atomicity.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Balanced journal entries are created from mapped events
- [ ] Posting is blocked or redirected when period is closed (per policy)
- [ ] Trial balance and ledger views support drilldown to source event

title: [CAP] Reconciliation, Audit, and Controls
body:
/kiro
# Business Requirement

## Classification (confirm labels)
- Type: capability
- Layer: domain
- Domain: accounting

## Epic
[EPIC] Enable Event-Driven Accounting (AP/AR + General Ledger)

## Capability
[CAP] Reconciliation, Audit, and Controls

## Description
Provide reconciliation support, immutable audit trail, and suspense handling for unmapped events.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Users can reconcile cash/bank activity
- [ ] Every posting is explainable and traceable to rules and sources
- [ ] Unmapped events can be corrected and reprocessed safely (idempotent)
